metadata.name: Hope
metadata.description:
A voice echoed saying: Years from now, will i still be hoping for a better future, will i still be standing, staring at the world before me.

My future is not certain but my today is what i can bank on. Five pinky years from now , there is a change I hope to see.

Trailing my way through the rails of Abuja to kaduna, my eyes caught this little girl in a posture that falshes both the past, present and the future of my country, Nigeria
